Well, i dont know if its a fake or not as i have not downloaded this. But i might think this is real for reasons i found when i looked it up. Its an oldie that i can barely remember heard of. Make up your own minds.

Thanks for posting this! I have very fond memories of failing my exams because of it! ;o)

Have Fun with this real first Realtime Strategy Game!

I have the Amiga Version to and upload the Torrent next Time

PPs. 
Sorry for my bad English.. ;-)
I rocked this game. I have played it for several hundred hours.. I remember every singel unit. But does it work in windows xp?

Nice 1 for this game, i havnt played this game in years, i had a commadore amiga when i last played it(15 floppys it came on,lol).Im going to have so much fun playing this classic and in my opinion the best of its kind game, oh and by the way if anybody has trouble playing this game in xp just unpack it to any folder and launch it using dosbox.
I LOVED this game.  So many sleepless nights.  Thanks for the download.
